name: Becky Williamson
text: Ordered Buffalo chicken pizza and came with onion and jalapeños. Wth??? Awful and soggy!

name: Jenny pittman
text: This is what you will get for fries if you bother with them. Its smaller then a small fry from McDonald's and it's almost 4 dollars.  They are very soggy and so not worth it. The consistancy of this place is terrible.

name: alex akers
text: They delivered my pizza in a trash bag and left it on my porch. Not only the box but the pizza itself was soggy.

name: Tifanie Wray-Adams
text: The absolute best staff around.

name: Stephanie
text: One of the best pizza huts. They are always on time, the foods made well, and the drivers are always super awesome! Just a really helpful, well run store.

name: Carlito Clausen
text: Classic pizza. Great wings!

name: INTIMIDAT3R
text:
Pizza Hut, in general, has gone downhill over the years.

Their pizzas used to be the best anywhere, but now they are below average to …More

name: Joey Shields
text: I ordered my food at 7 oclock PM from the mobile app it was supposed to arrive at 7:40 PM. At 8:40 when I still did not receive my food i called for assistance. I was put on hold for 15 minutes before Trevor hung up on me. I called back and …More

name: Charles Gerdts
text: This one is getting pretty run down.  The last time we were there my wife called in an order for me to pick up later after work.  They cooked the pizza so early that it was cold when I got there.  To their credit they made me a fresh order without me having to ask.

name: John Parker
text: Extremely inconsistent.  When you go to a restaurant repeated times you expect a certain quality and taste every time.  This is especially true with fast food chains.  This Pizza Hut will make you the signature Pizza Hut style pizza one …More

name: Brittanee Leege
text: If zero stars could be given, this store would receive it hands down. I waited over an hour for my order (still haven't received it), I called the store 3 times to only be transferred to "customer service" and all they could offer me was a measly $4 discount. Really?!?!?! Never again...

name: Amy
text: I remember when I was younger, we'd go to Pizza Hut for lunch and there would be tons of people, the staff was very friendly and professional, it was a clean place with fresh, hot food. Now? There might be 2 people working at a time. …More

name: Hanna Nuss
text: Order was ready fast but it was not great. A good staple to have as Pizza Hut normally can do no wrong.

name: Sofia Rosselet
text: Ordered online for a carry-out. Ready when estimated and staff was very polite. Pizza was the expected quality of the chain.

name: Morgan Sternat
text: The pizza was good, but I ordered the honey bbq wings, they pretty much just left the bbq out and gave me chicken...very dissapointing for somebody who loves Pizza Hut wings!

name: Jordan Gibbs
text: Brand new store looks great! It's a shame this is no longer a sit down restaurant. Delivery and carryout only but the location is great!

name: J Jackson
text: Headline: SCRANTON AREA PIZZA COMPANY PIZZA HUT APOLOGIZES TO VALUED CLIENT. SOME COMPANIES STILL KNOW HOW BUSINESS IS DONE. …More

name: Muhammad Bhatti
text: This Place is nice and People working hear so friendly

name: XoraDoodles
text: Great food. Sign up for their coupons actually is worth it. I havent been in the.new store uet but their delivery is fast

name: Dobies Pinscher
text: while it probably appeals to drunk frat boys, who don't know any better, this place is a stinking dive. filthy store, lights burnt out, making it dark even trying to enter the door, filthy floors, etc. don't bothering online, you won't get …More

name: Autumn Bonner
text: Use to be my fav pizza place. Not anymore. Skimp on toppings and cheese is far from the edge  of crust. Very disappointed.  Wings are very good pizza has lost its pazzaz

name: Toni Arends
text: I ordered 1/2 cheese pizza and there was maybe a hint of cheese on it!! Thanks. It tasted like cardboard.

name: Ifk Idk
text: Still waiting on my pizza. It has been an hour since I ordered and nothing. I spent $60. This is outrageous.

name: Chantelle McBride
text: Love their delivery drivers

name: Lee Chisum
text: Best pizza ever and the staff is great

name: Matt Z
text: Weird location for a pizza hut. The food was decent, but for some reason, the location and the views made my day kind of suck.

name: Lyle Johlas
text: Excellent pizza

name: jill lawson
text: Wonderful staff

name: Dave Williams
text: Always delicious
